thread.title: Police arrest suspect in decades-old 'Golden State Killer' case

title: Police arrest suspect in decades-old 'Golden State Killer' case
text:
Police arrest suspect in decades-old 'Golden State Killer' case Thursday, April 26, 2018 - 02:14
An elderly former police officer was arrested and charged in four muders authorities attributed to the Golden State Killer, a serial criminal suspected of dozens of rapes and slayings that terrorized partes of California during the 1970s and 1980s. Havovi Cooper reports.
